channel.title: Authors on Akshith's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Akshith's Portfolio

item.description:
I am a Data Scientist with an ability to work on Machine learning problems in python. Besides, I have a passion of story telling by seeing the data. Mostly my work will be AI related concepts dealing with real world problems. And completed few different projects in data science using python. Learning new technologies and concepts in AI were my keen interests which usually growing in me daily.

Apart from these, I have an interest in writing the things that are learnt in data science. And I started learning these concepts through online platforms which made my skills strong in this field as self-learner it is hard to grab the things. So, I took the decision of writing blogs about data science in easy to understand with resources that helps others.
